DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to see if children and adolescents with poorly controlled type 1 diabetes will benefit from using a continuous glucose monitor (CGM), a device that can be used to check blood sugars.
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Glucose Monitoring in Adolescents With Poorly Controlled Type 1 Diabetes
